RJ, do you ever do your own recordings?  I haven't seen any of your  yet, 
=
just wondersing....Sshh,...maybe RJ here works for the FBI,  Yikes!!!   No =

wonder spirit balked at doing this for me, sf
 
 
In a message dated 7/11/=
2010 6:09:25 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@... writes:

 
 
=
 
Because I already know what is.  So it wouldn't be a  valid trial for me.=



--- On Sun, 7/11/10, Frank Sumption  <purplealiengirl@purpleali> wrote:
=


From:  Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@purpleali>
Subject: Re:  [EVP-ITC]=
 Re: Experiment 20100710
To:  EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsTo: 
Date: Sunday, July 11=

Why don't you do your fraking recording and see if  "t=
hey"  tell what it 
is? 
 
F-S


On Sun, Jul 11, 2010 at 8:05 AM, rasterer =
<_rasterer@yahoo.  com_ 
(mip://08b061e8/mc/compose?to=3Drasterer@...=
) > wrote:


 
 
 

Three days left on this first experiment.

For those  w=
ho say skeptical people won't listen to any evidence, here is a 
 great way=
 to provide some publicly and prove or disprove that  statement.

And if yo=
ur're just the type who maintains an open  mind, and would like to 
try to =
see what works and what doesn't,  here's an opportunity to 
participate in =
a multi-person test.  


--- In _EVP-ITC@yahoogroups  .com_ 
(mip://08b061e=
8/mc/compose?to=3DEVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com) , "rasterer" <rasterer@...> wrot=
e:
>
>  
> I have placed a little something on top of my computer  monitor,=
 right in 
front of me. It is now 7/10/2010. I will leave it  there 4 days,=
 and remove 
it Noon Denver time, on Wednesday,  7/14/2010.
> 
> All you ha=
ve to do is ask your  boxes/spirits/ aliens/etc, what it is.
> 
> I have ta=
ken  a picture of it, and posted it to the files section here, 
so there  i=
s no way I can squirm out of the results:
> 
> _http://tech. groups.yahoo. =
com/group/  EVP-ITC/files/ RJ/RJ.20100710. 
1.zip_ (http://tech.groups.yaho=
o.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/RJ/RJ.20100710.1.zip) 
> 
> Please do  not try to=
 open the file before noon Wednesday. But feel free 
to  download it to you=
r computer beforehand, so you can be sure I won't  
change it during, or af=
ter, the test.
> 
> Answers  anyone reveals after noon Wednesday don't coun=
t. Partial answers 
 (like just the color, or shape, or some emotion vibe) =
don't count.  Just 
tell me what it is.
> 
> Best of Luck. I hope for  this=
 to be a regularly occurring experiment, 
and I hope we all can  learn from=
 the results.
>
